mapper.select: SELECT count(DISTINCT date_format(DBUSINESS, '%Y-%m-%d') ) FROM ${com}.d_t_food_bill b WHERE date_format(DBUSINESS, '%Y-%m-%d') >= #{startTime} AND date_format(DBUSINESS, '%Y-%m-%d') <= #{endTime} ORDER BY date_format(DBUSINESS, '%Y-%m-%d')

SELECT date_format(DBUSINESS, '%Y-%m-%d') businessDate, cBranch_C shopC, cBranch_N shopName, SUM(nFoodAmt) foodAmt, COUNT(cBranch_C) billNum, CASE WHEN (COUNT(cBranch_C) = 0) THEN 0 ELSE ROUND(SUM(nFoodAmt) / COUNT(cBranch_C),2) END amtPerBill, SUM(iGuestNum) guestNum, CASE WHEN (SUM(iGuestNum) = 0) THEN 0 ELSE ROUND(SUM(nFoodAmt) / SUM(iGuestNum) ,2) END amtPerGuest, COUNT(DISTINCT cTable_N) tableNum, CASE WHEN (SUM(nFoodAmt) = 0) THEN 0 ELSE ROUND(SUM(nFoodAmt) / COUNT(DISTINCT cTable_N) ,2) END amtPerTable, CASE WHEN (SUM(iGuestNum)=0) THEN 0 ELSE ROUND(SUM(iGuestNum) / COUNT(DISTINCT cTable_N) ,2) END guestPerTable, SUM(nDisAmt) disAmt, SUM(nRoundAmt) roundAmt, SUM(nPresentAmt) presentAmt, SUM(nOughtAmt) oughtAmt, SUM(nPayAmt) payAmt FROM ${com}.d_t_food_bill WHERE date_format(DBUSINESS, '%Y-%m-%d') IN ( SELECT date_format(DBUSINESS, '%Y-%m-%d') FROM ${com}.d_t_food_bill d WHERE DBUSINESS >= #{startTime} AND DBUSINESS <= #{endTime} GROUP BY date_format(DBUSINESS, '%Y-%m-%d') ) GROUP BY date_format(DBUSINESS, '%Y-%m-%d'), cBranch_C, cBranch_N ORDER BY date_format(DBUSINESS, '%Y-%m-%d'), cBranch_C

SELECT 'all' businessDate, cBranch_C shopC, cBranch_N shopName, SUM(nFoodAmt) foodAmt, COUNT(cBranch_C) billNum, CASE WHEN (COUNT(cBranch_C) = 0) THEN 0 ELSE ROUND(SUM(nFoodAmt) / COUNT(cBranch_C),2) END amtPerBill, SUM(iGuestNum) guestNum, CASE WHEN (SUM(iGuestNum) = 0) THEN 0 ELSE ROUND(SUM(nFoodAmt) / SUM(iGuestNum) ,2) END amtPerGuest, COUNT(DISTINCT cTable_N) tableNum, CASE WHEN ((SUM(nFoodAmt) = 0) OR (COUNT(DISTINCT cTable_N)=0)) THEN 0 ELSE ROUND(SUM(nFoodAmt) / COUNT(DISTINCT cTable_N) ,2) END amtPerTable, CASE WHEN ((SUM(nFoodAmt) = 0) OR (COUNT(DISTINCT cTable_N)=0)) THEN 0 ELSE ROUND(SUM(iGuestNum) / COUNT(DISTINCT cTable_N) ,2) END guestPerTable, SUM(nDisAmt)disAmt, SUM(nRoundAmt) roundAmt, SUM(nPresentAmt) presentAmt, SUM(nOughtAmt) oughtAmt, SUM(nPayAmt) payAmt FROM ${com}.d_t_food_bill WHERE DBUSINESS >= #{startTime} AND DBUSINESS <= #{endTime} GROUP BY cBranch_C, cBranch_N ORDER BY cBranch_C
